author: entertainment.ie
title: Hotel Deal of the Week: The Mulranny Park Hotel
text:
The Mulranny Park Hotel, Mulranny, Westport, Co. Mayo
CYCLE THE GREENWAY: €159pps – 2 nights Bed & Breakfast with Dinner on one evening. Includes one day’s bicycle hire with a packed lunch to explore the new Great Western Greenway.
The Greenway is the longest off-road walking and cycle trail in Ireland. Children over 5 cost €25 per night (B&B) when sharing with parents, under 5’s share free (B&B).
This is a midweek offer, valid September 1 to November 6, 2015.
www.mulrannyparkhotel.ie
